ygData.subject: Re: Azure
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, that s it. I definitely need more sleep. Sorry guys, but I m running on about 4 hours of sleep since I stayed up most of the night getting my server back

Ok, that's it. I definitely need more sleep. Sorry guys, but I'm running on about 4 hours of sleep since I stayed up most of the night getting my server back on the internet. Anyways, I think I confused everyone enough now, so I'll shut up with the OOCs after this one.

Anyways, that post was for Azure's situation. I thought he was the one that asked if he could do whatever.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Ok, my last post was for Azure, not Airly. Sorry for the confusion :-)
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > You bet. Our (the council's) goal is to guard against moding, and that mostly happens with new weapons (that's why certain people are being bugged by us more than others). Mostly-storyline things (like reformatting Australia, which doesn't create a superweapon or anything, but creates an interesting area to RP in) are generally good.
